website_summaries.verdict: This inexpensive nylon bags holds your cymbals, your sticks, and any other gear you might need.
pros: Nylon canvas fabric exterior with nylon interior
Features two reinforced carry handles and a shoulder strap
Spacious zippered front pocket designed to hold drumstick bag and more
cons: Shoulder strap can fail, so use for transportation with caution

customer_reviews.title: Cheap, and you get what you pay for here.
customer_reviews.text: I’ve not used it beyond my practice space at home, but the material and construction do not inspire confidence. It is very thin material, and I don’t see this surviving the rigors of gigging or really, any day to day use. If you’re just planning to use it in one place like on your kit in a rehearsal spot or practice room, it will probably be fine. Otherwise, I would just spend the extra $11 to get something sturdier. (Also, I purchased the 24” bag; it’s slightly better quality, but it will also not leave the practice space and just be there for cymbal storage).
customer_reviews.author: fuquan

customer_reviews.title: Good cymbal bag for the price
customer_reviews.text: I have had this cymbal bag for about a year and and it's still in great shape. For a few months, it got heavy use and held up well. No tears, snagged zippers, or anything else. I typically pack it with a ride, couple of crash cymbals, and hihats in it without any problems and enough space. It's not super padded with a bunch dividers, but then again that's not what you are paying for with this. If you want a basic, well-made cymbal bag at a budget price, then this bag will work for you.
customer_reviews.author: Benjamin C.

customer_reviews.title: Cymbal storage bag
customer_reviews.text: Comparing to my gator cases, this cymbal case is very nice for the price. No use to spend a ton of money on something just for stationary storage for cheap cymbals. The material seems durable as well as the zipper. Currently, i have seven cymbals in one case. Seems overkill but they fit great with a ease of protection from dust and dirt. I will try to update as i use it more in terms of lifetime storage within my closet.
customer_reviews.author: Matt S.

customer_reviews.title: It gets the job done
customer_reviews.text: This is the second stuck bag I've purchased for my son who lost the first one. Boo. I decided to buy something less expensive the second time around. This one is a little smaller which works well, because it fits in his backpack. The first one did not. Zipper functions well, and there is plenty of room for several sticks and mallets. Fingers crossed that we don't lose this one, and that it holds up.
customer_reviews.author: nikirio

customer_reviews.title: Bag could be of better design.
customer_reviews.text: It is a good bag for your cymbals unfortunately it does not have compartments like the other bags So your cymbals are loose inside . But if you use your brains you will come up with an idea how to restrain your cymbals inside the bag. But if you are going to Carrie only one 24 inch cymbal then the bag is perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Grupo Zapata

customer_reviews.title: Look for a different bag.
customer_reviews.text: I was excited to find this product for a decent value and the reviews seemed to support it would be worth it. However, with barely two months of usage the seams are totally blown out and the fabric has holes. It was used to take sticks to class for middle school and started to show wear after two weeks but is completely useless now after two months. Very disappointing.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Broke after first use
customer_reviews.text: Used this to transport cymbals for a gig, and one of the metal rings holding the shoulder strap snapped the first time I used it. Luckily I was able to catch the bag before it hit the ground and damaged my cymbals.
customer_reviews.author: The Lukewarm

customer_reviews.title: Great all around case!
customer_reviews.text: Unless you're looking for more storage options by way of pockets this is a great case for cymbals. Simple and to the point, durable, and includes one large zipper pocket which I have actually been using more than I thought to and from gigs. Fits my 20 inch cymbal snug as well, no extra room for shifting and moving around.
customer_reviews.author: J.Zim

customer_reviews.title: For the price can't go wrong
customer_reviews.text: Was looking for a second cymbal bag as my primary was getting pretty full and worn. . . This item hit the sweet spot between price and functionality. Will probably buy another in the future.
customer_reviews.author: Smokezilla

customer_reviews.title: Great product, quality and functionality
customer_reviews.text: Put wood in, pull wood out. Spin it around if you want to. The feel is great and hangs just right. Fits right where I need it. I put my sticks in and out of it multiple times a day and it’s always there and ready every single time. Don’t be afraid to give it a good slap from time to time, it’s still gonna hold your sticks and accessories. Strongly recommend
customer_reviews.author: jamie stonerock

customer_reviews.title: Sent Folded in quarters
customer_reviews.text: They folded the bag into quarters and stuffed it into a bag and then put it into a giant box that would have fit the bag without folding? Why? Bag still has creases in it after a few weeks. Think it needs to go back. Good bag, moronic shipping.
customer_reviews.author: Hal Jordan

customer_reviews.title: Very roomy, sturdy, and with a nice price.
customer_reviews.text: This bag is huge!! It could fit cymbals up to 27in comfortably if you wish, it makes my 24in cymbal look normal sized. It seems very sturdy, and the side pocket is big enough for a stick bag, music, books, small extra hardware, and more with room to spare. For the price, this goes above and beyond for quality.
customer_reviews.author: jon

customer_reviews.title: Cheap, ugly, but she gets the job done.
customer_reviews.text: Aesthetically, it's not as nice as other brands. It's a little more flimsy than my old Vic Firth bag, but the zipper broke on that one and I'm not willingly to pay close to $20 for another. This one is dirt cheap, and it gets the job done. Huge front pocket is convenient for carrying metronome, ear plugs, etc.
customer_reviews.author: Dante

customer_reviews.title: Good value.
customer_reviews.text: I use this for transporting a couple cymbals. It keeps them protected and makes it easy to carry them.
customer_reviews.author: Nicki Bailey

customer_reviews.title: Too short for my Vic Firth quad sticks. Every ...
customer_reviews.text: Too short for my Vic Firth quad sticks. Every other drum stick bag I own is longer than this one.
customer_reviews.author: Bryan Alvarez

customer_reviews.title: pretty much what I expected for 15 bucks
customer_reviews.text: pretty much what I expected for 15 bucks. Obviously not the best quality product, but it keeps the dust off of my cymbals. I never use more than 2 crashes at a gig so this bag has yet to carry some real weight. Overall, perfect for my needs, but not my wants. I wish there were at least two dividers inside and I wish the bottom half of the bag was a heavier material. If this bag tears, i will let you know when it does.
customer_reviews.author: Joe T.

customer_reviews.title: great bag
customer_reviews.text: I'm only using it at home as a storage bag for my other cymbals. I'm actually surprised the overall quality of the bag for the price. The huge side pocket is great! I have a stick bag in there plus a ton of small things and still have room for more.
customer_reviews.author: pat

customer_reviews.title: Nice fit and decent padding.
customer_reviews.text: Great price and quality exceeded my expectations. Fits my Paiste 20" Ride with room for my 16" Crashand 12" Splash as well.
customer_reviews.author: Marc Smith

customer_reviews.title: Good Bag
customer_reviews.text: This bag is nice and thick....you get more than you pay for. I paid $19.95 and it was well worth it!!
customer_reviews.author: Mike

customer_reviews.title: Great deal for the money !!!!!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Looked at a lot of cymbal bags-this was the best price-for the money a great deal !!!
customer_reviews.author: J Saxman

customer_reviews.title: Decent bag
customer_reviews.text: Overall great, but somewhat floppy and sometimes the sticks fall out.
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth

customer_reviews.title: Good inexpensive bag for larger cymbals
customer_reviews.text: I like the large size. Flimsier than most cymbal bags I’ve owned.... let’s see how long it lasts before ripping
customer_reviews.author: Aota

customer_reviews.title: Solid bag
customer_reviews.text: This is a nice stick bag unfortunately not a lot of space
customer_reviews.author: titus taylor jr

customer_reviews.title: This is perfect for my use and very well made
customer_reviews.text: This is perfect for my use and very well made. I'm a photographer and the bags that come with reflectors are poor quality thin material and they quickly fall apart. I purchased this bag to use for my large reflector. It's a little oversize, but it has pockets to keep my clamps and even a flash it so desired.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Kitchen Knife Bag
customer_reviews.text: Used for my kitchen knife bag. Lots of slots, deep front pocket, durable material. Works great!
customer_reviews.author: Joel Tripp

customer_reviews.title: Great deal for the quality.
customer_reviews.text: For the price on this case you can not go wrong. It is decent quality and holds a good amount of different size sticks.
customer_reviews.author: Joshua M.

customer_reviews.title: Won't hold up long.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this along with a few pairs of sticks/mallets for my son's school band class. In less than 3 months, it's riddled with holes where seams once were. We've also had a mallet snapped because it was hanging out of one of said holes. Fortunately, it wasn't expensive.
customer_reviews.author: RANDY CZUBA

customer_reviews.title: Good Product For The Price
customer_reviews.text: For the money a good purchase. Does a good job of protecting your cymbals.
customer_reviews.author: Prier

customer_reviews.title: That'll do, bag.
customer_reviews.text: I was bummed it doesn't have sleeves to separate cymbals, but I mean it's like $18. It does the job.
customer_reviews.author: JBCincy

customer_reviews.title: Excellent and Compact Drumstick Bag
customer_reviews.text: This is an excellent and reasonably priced drumstick bag. Although I have been playing for decades, this is my first drumstick bag. Nice pouches and Velcro covered one that is create for holding smaller items like earbuds for in-ear monitors.
customer_reviews.author: SKova

customer_reviews.title: Love it for the price it is a good deal
customer_reviews.text: Love it for the price it is a good deal. If you are thinking to do airplane or backline transportation, it sont be enough. it is a good bag for light and medium cymbals to bring with you in your normal day.
customer_reviews.author: Eric

customer_reviews.title: Useful storage, within reach
customer_reviews.text: My son loved this. He's a drummer who often plays in close quarters. And I know he has a ton of drum sticks because I get them for him every year. It's a convenient thing to hang off the side of the drums for fast and easy access to sticks when you need them.
customer_reviews.author: Ariel

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Surprisingly padded... no bells and whistles with this thing but it will protect your brass.
customer_reviews.author: Cory Landry

customer_reviews.title: Good value
customer_reviews.text: This did exactly what I wanted. It holds my 24” ride cymbals and the other smaller ones. Not the strongest cymbal case out there but for the price it is a solid buy. I’m not going to use the shoulder strap because I don’t want to chance it.
customer_reviews.author: Joseph Randazzo

customer_reviews.title: great value for money
customer_reviews.text: good value for the price. no dividers like my pa meinl bag, but i was able. with some soft inserts, to put my 1968 paiste formula 602 20" thin crash, and my much newer sabian spotted leopard 20" heavy ride cymbals.
customer_reviews.author: endsng

customer_reviews.title: Not for active musicians!  Save your gig money!
customer_reviews.text: With regular use (weekend gigs) it only lasted 4 weeks. If you play out, save the money and invest in a better quality. This one is not for active musicians.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Quinto

customer_reviews.title: Great value
customer_reviews.text: WOW, I was skeptical, but boy is this a well made bag. This is a thick nylon material. I use it for my 18" shaman drum. I couldn't be happier with the value.
customer_reviews.author: LE

customer_reviews.title: Nicely made drumstick bag!!
customer_reviews.text: Ordered this to hold various drum sticks and mallets! Looking forward to using this with my Pearl Xylophone/Bells at fun performances with my local community marching band.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer M.

customer_reviews.title: Well worth the price
customer_reviews.text: This is a great bag, especially at such a low price. I highly recommend it. No sense paying more for a different name.
customer_reviews.author: K. McArthur

customer_reviews.title: Good value for the money.
customer_reviews.text: The only drawback was the shoulder strap broke on the first outing. The connector is plastic and broke very easily. The handles seem to work well.
customer_reviews.author: George M

customer_reviews.title: GOOD OUTER PROTECTION
customer_reviews.text: I know it's inexpensive, but dividers would have been 5 stars.
customer_reviews.author: B. Talbot

customer_reviews.title: This as not sewed properly The drum sticks fall out ...
customer_reviews.text: This as not sewed properly The drum sticks fall out of the bottom of the corner the zipper does not close the bag. . I guess I could use duck tape to stop that. Will not take back I missed the window for returns by 10 days, Shame on Amazon.
customer_reviews.author: GRR

customer_reviews.title: Great holder
customer_reviews.text: Great drumstick holder. Fits nicely. Holds all my son's drumsticks and apparently is a good snack holder too, for when a 10 year old needs a quick snack from jamming out!
customer_reviews.author: Resses2

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: Handle broke off as soon as I picked it up! You get what you pay for. Luckily I caught the bag before it hit the ground
customer_reviews.author: Rod

customer_reviews.title: Travel Bag for Cap's Shield
customer_reviews.text: This was a gift to my friend who's a Captain America cosplayer -- this fit his 24" steel shield perfectly for travel.
customer_reviews.author: Sfandra

customer_reviews.title: It is great and does not fall apart
customer_reviews.text: I use it for my Scrabble boards and it is great.
customer_reviews.author: The Skeptical Shopper

customer_reviews.title: Must have!
customer_reviews.text: DEF fit's my 20" ride perfect, along with the 5 other cymbals to include hi-hats I travel will. Not cheaply made and will protect your valuables.
customer_reviews.author: Twitch

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Cheap, gets the job done. Internal pocket fits tuning key, allen wrench, and hihat clutch.
customer_reviews.author: Alex

customer_reviews.title: Great product!!
customer_reviews.text: Great quality! I am very pleased with this stick bag. I've had mine for about a year now and it's holding up wonderfully!
customer_reviews.author: TheElliott’s

customer_reviews.title: A Christmas gift for a young drummer
customer_reviews.text: This product was purchased as a Christmas gift for a person that drumsticks continues to increase. This product also has a little pouch to store other accessories.
customer_reviews.author: Surveyor

customer_reviews.title: For $20 it will work just fine. I'm curious about how long the handle will ...
customer_reviews.text: For $20 it will work just fine. I'm curious about how long the handle will hold up if it is filled with cymbals on a regular basis. Time will tell
customer_reviews.author: mboise

customer_reviews.title: the overall quality is average but it's also inexpensive.  I like it.
customer_reviews.text: It hangs from a floor tom which is really cool... the overall quality is average but it's also inexpensive. I like it.

customer_reviews.title: but I think that it will be a great replacement for my old Zildjian bag
customer_reviews.text: A high quality cymbal bag. I haven't used it a ton yet, but I think that it will be a great replacement for my old Zildjian bag.
customer_reviews.author: NBee

customer_reviews.title: Great Item
customer_reviews.text: Nice looking and durable bag. It keeps our drum sticks all nicely in one place. The fact that it is padded is a plus. Great Item.
customer_reviews.author: El Malo

customer_reviews.title: Good and cheaper than other brands.
customer_reviews.text: Holds a few cymbals well. All you really need is to put cloth between each cymbal and you're good to go. Hasn't broken or teared on me yet and it's been several months
customer_reviews.author: A M

customer_reviews.title: Simple drum stick holder
customer_reviews.text: It’s a simple drum stick bag. It does the Job as it should
customer_reviews.author: Eli

customer_reviews.title: Fine but not what was expected
customer_reviews.text: It's fine I guess but the sticks fall out because the zipper doesn't close the bag completely
customer_reviews.author: W. Beckles

customer_reviews.title: Nice bag. Won't accommodate too many cymbals but you ...
customer_reviews.text: Nice bag. Won't accommodate too many cymbals but you can't beat the price.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great deal on these, they work as good as any of the other expensive ones.

customer_reviews.title: hate the fact that you have to tie the thing ...
customer_reviews.text: hate the fact that you have to tie the thing on. it should come with hooks to easily take on and off.

customer_reviews.title: a good buy!
customer_reviews.text: For the money and for what I needed for, a good buy!.

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Drumstick Bag
customer_reviews.text: Held my sticks right where I needed them to grab in a hurry.

customer_reviews.title: The quality an durability is most important
customer_reviews.text: It is nice an have alot of room in it to put my drum sticks..

customer_reviews.title: I like the strap it comes and a catalog
customer_reviews.text: Just got this in yesterday with two day shipping. You can't go wrong for the price. I like the strap it comes and a catalog.

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars

customer_reviews.title: Not durable
customer_reviews.text: I contacted ChromaCast customer support and they never got back to me. Be aware, bag is terrible.

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: No surprises. Arrived on time, and very suitable for my needs.

customer_reviews.title: Drummers all need this.
customer_reviews.text: Our son is a drummer and this bag was just what he needed. Numerous pockets... well constructed.

customer_reviews.title: I was looking for a very small bag to put a pair of drumsticks in.
customer_reviews.text: Wasn’t what I was looking for. I was looking for a small bag to put a pair of drumsticks.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Excellent value. Hard to find a 24" cymbal bag
customer_reviews.text: Excellent value. Hard to find a 24" cymbal bag. Quality is better than I expected. Thanks for the great product. Mark Staub

customer_reviews.title: does what it was meant to do, im not ...
customer_reviews.text: does what it was meant to do, im not a full time drummer so it shouldn't get much wear and tear.
customer_reviews.author: daniel

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for round SCRABBLE board
customer_reviews.text: Reasonable price and just about perfect for storing/transporting a round acrylic Sam's Timer SCRABBLE BOARD. (I may add some foam padding to inside bottom for better protection.) [note: When I was a drummer in the mid-'60s to early '80s, I always used Zildjian cymbals. I was hoping to get a Zildjian-logo'd bag for my round Scrabble board. Unfortunately, the Z bag is lower quality than this one.]
customer_reviews.author: ndez

customer_reviews.title: easily portable drumstick bag holds quite a few pair of ...
customer_reviews.text: This inexpensive, easily portable drumstick bag holds quite a few pair of sticks of various sizes. The external pocket holds shorter sticks, the inner small pocket can hold a drum tuning key plus other small objects and there are pockets inside which can comfortably hold 4 pairs of regular sized sticks with extra room inside for more. The zippered bag is made of a burlap-like synthetic material which seems durable and it has a draw string and burlap handle for easy portability. Recommended !!!
customer_reviews.author: andrew cordle

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: It's a bag that zips and the Velcro works not too hard to get right
customer_reviews.author: DJ_LBR

customer_reviews.title: Great price, perfect for our needs
customer_reviews.text: Exactly what my daughter needed for band. Great price, perfect for our needs!
customer_reviews.author: Bekah

customer_reviews.title: Great price, good product.
customer_reviews.text: Gives you the impression of being cheaply made, but all in all it is doing the job that it needs to do!
customer_reviews.author: TicoTina

customer_reviews.title: Nice product.
customer_reviews.text: Does the job and even is spacious enough for two 20-inch cymbals, with a 2 and a half inch space.

customer_reviews.title: grabbag@ holder!
customer_reviews.text: shipped fast. $ great. great for beginners @ to take a few w/u where every u go.discription great, awesome to work with!!!

customer_reviews.title: the strap broke on the first day I got it ...
customer_reviews.text: the strap broke on the first day I got it and tried to carry my cymbals in it. I still use the bag but its very cheap.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: can hold cymbals comfortably in side
customer_reviews.text: It has a strong build to it! can hold cymbals comfortably in side. Has hardcore zippers for longer lasting use.
customer_reviews.author: Evan T

customer_reviews.title: You get what you pay for. Strap connection broke ...
customer_reviews.text: You get what you pay for. Strap connection broke the second time I used it. I didn't expect much when I bought it anyway.

customer_reviews.title: Good price
customer_reviews.text: What can i say it carries your sticks. Good price point

customer_reviews.title: It's perfect for keeping all your drumsticks in one place
customer_reviews.text: It's perfect for keeping all your drumsticks in one place. Not too good for live performances in case that one drumstick blows off.

customer_reviews.title: COVERED IN MOLD
customer_reviews.text: Bag looks like it's well made, but unfortunately when I received it, it was covered in mold. I will attempt to clean, but very disappointed in the condition of the product.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Drum Bag
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love these bags and so do my students!

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Holds all my cymbals with room for more! gr8 product
customer_reviews.author: meerkatman

customer_reviews.title: Proceed with caution if you plan to use the shoulder strap...
customer_reviews.text: The ChromaCast 20" padded cymbal bag protects cymbals at a reasonable price. Proceed with caution if you plan to use the shoulder strap to carry the bag loaded with cymbals. I loaded my bag with a 20" ride, a 17" & 18" crash, and a set of 14" hi-hats. After I picked up the bag using the shoulder strap, the weight of the cymbals broke the clip attaching to the bag. If you do buy this bag, don't overload it and do use the handles rather than the shoulder strap. This would also serve as good storage and transport of spare drumheads.
customer_reviews.author: Motty

customer_reviews.title: A basic way to move your cymbals and keep them ...
customer_reviews.text: A basic way to move your cymbals and keep them clean. Not much protective padding here at this price level.
customer_reviews.author: Nathan D.

customer_reviews.title: AWESOME
customer_reviews.text: Great product!! Ordered this for my brother and he has had it for about 8 months and takes it with him on the go alot and it still looks new. He loves it and its so convenient.
customer_reviews.author: Katie Manzella

customer_reviews.title: Good bag for someone who doesn't need to carry a lot of sticks/mallets
customer_reviews.text: Honestly with this bag you get what you pay for. The pockets aren't that deep and I wouldn't try to put more than 5 or 6 pairs of sticks in there. The accessory pouches are nice
customer_reviews.author: Tony

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: not very padded, strap holder broke. I would go for a different brand next time.

customer_reviews.title: Fast delivery  and good Quality
customer_reviews.text: This product is exactly what I was expecting. Fast delivery and good Quality.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great durable case ! Perfect for my 11 year old.

customer_reviews.title: The price was great!!
customer_reviews.text: My son loves this stick bag, he was in need and I happen to see it on a special. The price was great!!!!!!
customer_reviews.author: kitty

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Seems to be fairly good for the price. will buy from the seller again.
customer_reviews.author: Herbert Bozman

customer_reviews.title: It works great for that and now I don't have them all ...
customer_reviews.text: I bought one of these to put all my various sized photography reflectors in. The other reviewer that did the same thing was what drove me to buy it. It works great for that and now I don't have them all separate, flopping around! Even works great for shooting in the field with the included shoulder strap for lugging around.
customer_reviews.author: SCMX

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Works really good been using it for shows definitely worth the money!
customer_reviews.author: Kirk Jones

customer_reviews.title: Handy and Clean Way to Store Extra Drumsticks
customer_reviews.text: This is a very convenient, inexpensive way to store my extra drumsticks. I have an electronic drum rack so it is easy to find a knob or metal extension on to which to hang this bag. This looks much better than the shopping bag I was using and hanging on my drum rack.
customer_reviews.author: JR

customer_reviews.title: Does the job with no frills
customer_reviews.text: This is a very functional and cheap drumstick bag - It doesn't have any padding and the zipper isn't that great but it holds a bunch of sticks and cost less than $8 - I almost wish I would have bought a little nicer and more expensive bag but this one works and the price was great
customer_reviews.author: J Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Decent cheap cymbal bag.
customer_reviews.text: I can carry my 18" Ride, 16" crash, and 14" hi-hats inside, along with my entire stick bag in the outer pocket. The shoulder sling seems sturdy, but the handles will probably fail, eventually. For the price I paid ($15) it is what I expected.
customer_reviews.author: n.atha.n

product_meta.title: ChromaCast 24" Padded Cymbal Bag
product_meta.description: Size:24" Cymbal BagThis cymbal bag makes transporting your cymbals safe, easy and comfortable. The rugged ChromaCast bag keeps your cymbals secure while the front exterior pocket has enough room for all of your random drum keys, sticks, music sheets or your cell phone. It has 10 mm thick padding on the interior of the bag to ensure your cymbal makes it to the gig without any obnoxious dings or scratches and the shoulder strap gives you the opportunity to be hands free so you can carry everything else you'll need at your gig.
feature_bullets: Two Reinforced Carry Handles, One Shoulder Strap
Spacious Zippered Front Pocket designed to fit the ChromaCast Drumstick Bag, as well as much more.
Rugged durable Nylon Canvas Fabric Exterior, Nylon Interior

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.5 out of 5 stars326 ratings4.5 out of 5 stars
